author: nixo.eth
content:
gm! <@119818938845495298> & I created a tool to help people better understand and compare across the EIPs proposed for the Glamsterdam fork: <https://forkcast.org/upgrade/glamsterdam>
Our focus was on the headliner proposals but there's also a page for Fusaka and the info for the Fusaka EIPs have had less manual review.
We would love any feedback (feel free to DM) or [PRs](https://github.com/wolovim/forkcast)

author: timbeiko
content: I think this is critical enough that teams should review before ACDE tomorrow. The thread is long, but <@429719902363058177>'s comment here reflects the latest proposal: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9910#issuecomment-3028544540

author: timbeiko
content:
I've added this to the agenda for ACD tomrorow: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1601

Additionally, it would be good to finalize the `maxBlobsPerTx` for BPOs, and any other outstanding Fusaka spec changes. 

I'd also like to discuss how this afffects the Glamsterdam timelines, and how we should treat non-headliner candidates for now. 

<@543900561460822016> also had some history expiry standardization questions to cover.

author: draganrakita
content:
PRs that need confirmation for EIP-7907:
* https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9910 and patch https://github.com/lightclient/EIPs/pull/11
  * reduction of codesize to 48kB
  * addressing EXTCODESIZE
  * gas cost bump from 2 to 4 (per (32 byte) word)
* https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9955
  * charge gas for loading tx target code
And that should be it
